title: [Feature] Remove `Column#function` mechanims in the kernel
description:
Search before asking

  • I had searched in the issues and found no similar feature requirement.

Description

This is a conclusion from #11956 discussion proposed by @bbcdabao

After the discussion, I think we don't need this anymore. In the later v9 and v10, we have full functional MQE to support picking various preferences of the values in the query range. We don't need to determine that at the aggregation function level.

Meanwhile, TopN(aggregation query) is easier if it doesn't rely on this thing. And avg always makes sense and matches the intuition.

Use case

No response

Related issues

No response
